Blackstorm::

Blackstorm couldn't belive what she heard "listen..."said 
tembled "You should better don't tell anyone what you have said... 
anyone have to heard that or you might be in trouble and that means 
that me too... what if they try to rescue me... why can't I remember 
them..."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        He nods calmly.  "Yes, I am.  You were once a Maximal known 
as 
> Nightlight.  It was my fault you were captured so I'm here to 
protect you, no 
> matter what.  Even if it means fighting my former comrades."  He 
looks down 
> and stares intensely at his hands.  "You're that important.  Not 
just to me, 
> or anyone else.  But to the future."  He sighs.  "I don't think I 
can explain 
> it.  I just know you are."
